summary: A cricketer turns kick-boxer in order to avenge the death of his brother.
cast: Farooq Shaikh|Nafisa Ali|Aanaahad|Sabyasachi Chakrabarty|Shradha Das|Sushant Singh|Kelly Dorji|Saurabh Shukla|Mukesh Rishi|Nirmal Pandey|Shraddha Nigam|Ashish Vidyarthi|Uday Atroliyer|Ram Awana|Khushi Awasthi|Balraj|Samir Chandra|Shaji Chaudhary|Syoh Lal Chaudhary|Satyam Chauhan|Sanjay Chawla|Alind Chopra|Vedant Dak|Avnesh Devichand|Divya|Gilani|Mariam Hussain|Jaswant|Jeeva|Pankaj Jha|Upendra Joshi|Jagdish Kansara|Shabnam Kapoor|Raja Kapse|Kancha Karki|Neelaabh Kaul|Rudra Kaushish|Nitin Keswani|Iqbal Khan|Rajiv Khanna|Awadhesh Kumar|Kapil Kumar|Deven Lodhia|Lalit Kumar Malla|Fidal Miller|Pramod Moutho|Neha|Rosey Nicholson|Preet Oberoi|Praveen Pachpore|Gopal Pandit|Hariom Parashar|Prem Prakash|Priyanka|Shafiq Quereshi|Karati Raja|Ashish Rawat|Sanjeeb|Salim Shah|Rizwan Shaikh|Aditya Sharma|Manoj Sharma|Shekhar Sharma|Sourav Sharma|Sunil Sharma|Shivam Singh|Tushar Singhal|Prakash Sudarshan|Prerna Tiwari|Ajay Trehan|Zarir
title: Lahore
